datamodel

类 RatingSystem2DBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.RatingSystem2DBoolean

  • public class RatingSystem2DBoolean
extends java.lang.Object
    The basic data model. The data is organized in 2D of triples. Boolean means that a boolean matrix indicates the training set. The purpose is to enable incremental learning.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0.
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

      The default missing rating.

      Which elements belong to the training set.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RatingSystem2DBoolean

        public RatingSystem2DBoolean(java.lang.String paraFilename,
                             int paraNumUsers,
                             int paraNumItems,
                             int paraNumRatings,
                             double paraRatingLowerBound,
                             double paraRatingUpperBound,
                             double paraLikeThreshold,
                             boolean paraCompress)
        The first constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The data filename.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.
        paraRatingLowerBound - The lower bound of ratings.
        paraRatingUpperBound - The upper bound of ratings.
        paraLikeThrehold - The threshold for like.
        paraCompress - Is the data in compress format?

      • RatingSystem2DBoolean

        public RatingSystem2DBoolean(RatingSystem2DBoolean paraDataset)
        The second constructor. Deep clone.
        参数:
        paraDataset - The given dataset.

                      int paraNumUsers,
                      int paraNumItems,
                      int paraNumRatings)

        Read the data from the file.
        参数:

        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.

      • getItemPopularity

        public int getItemPopularity(int paraItem)
        Getter.

      • centralize

        public void centralize()
        Adjust the whole dataset with mean rating. The ratings are subtracted with the mean rating. So do the rating bounds and the like threshold.

      • computeAverage

        public void computeAverage()
        Compute average rating of each item. It may be useful in M-distance based prediction.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Show me.
